plot: Paul has gone to the park to join Sylvie. But while he is waiting for her he meets Marion, who might well be the love of his life.
title: Un après midi au parc
plot_es: Paul has gone to the park to join Sylvie. But while he is waiting for her he meets Marion, who might well be the love of his life.
plot_en: Paul has gone to the park to join Sylvie. But while he is waiting for her he meets Marion, who might well be the love of his life.
